Interest on total capital investment has been taken into account @15%. The break-even point is calculated on full capacity utilization basis. The salary & wages is considered on the basis of prevailing market rate. To achieve production capacity, 15 days trial production is required. The unit will run on single shift basis per day and 300 working days per year at 75% capacity utilization. The proposed project envisaged to manufacture 3 MT per day.   1.
